body:
Sevaan has updated the mock: https://mozilla.invisionapp.com/share/UC9XM7O9X#/screens/239894733_Shield_Study

I've updated the original description to note that we're not including the "More" links shown in that mockup. The other modifications (No preferences button, no time remaining indicator) also still apply.
